thread.title: Bianca Gascoigne's devastated boyfriend CJ Meeks moves out of their home as she says she's missing Jamie O'Hara on CBB
thread.title_full: Bianca Gascoigne's devastated boyfriend CJ Meeks moves out of their home as she says she's missing Jamie O'Hara on CBB

author: Vicki Newman
title: Bianca Gascoigne's devastated boyfriend CJ Meeks moves out of their home as she says she's missing Jamie O'Hara on CBB
text:
Bianca Gascoigne's devastated boyfriend CJ Meeks moves out of their home as she says she's missing Jamie O'Hara on CBB CJ has watched his girlfriend cheat on him on national television Share CJ Meeks has moved out of the house he shared with girlfriend Bianca Gascoigne (Photo: Channel 5/MAGICMOMENTS) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The devastated boyfriend of Bianca Gascoigne has moved out of their home after she cheated on him with her Celebrity Big Brother housemate. 
CJ Meeks was forced to watch as his girlfriend got close to Jamie O'Hara on the Channel 5 reality show. 
He's seen them lying in bed together, kissing, cuddling and sneaking off to share some alone time. 
After footballer Jamie was evicted from the famous house on Monday night, model Bianca admitted she's missing him, and that seems to have been the final straw for CJ. Read More "She's wifey material": Jamie O'Hara says he could fall in love with Bianca Gascoigne and wants relationship after CBB CJ has watched his girlfriend get close to another man (Photo: MAGICMOMENTSUK) 
The cagefighter was spotted moving his things out of the home they share after admitting he doesn't want to see her when she leaves the show. 
The UFC star had been planning to propose to his girlfriend - stepdaughter of Paul Gascoigne - but now feels "humiliated" by what she's done. 
He told The Sun Online : "I’m better than that and I’m gone, it’s as simple as that." CJ is a UFC fighter (Photo: Facebook) CJ was planning to propose to Bianca (Photo: Instagram/official_meeks) 
CJ was seen leaving their home with his belongings in a suitcase and carrying larger items, like a flat screen TV, to his car. 
A source told The Sun Online: “CJ has taken his essential thing, including the TV, but he’s left everything else because he doesn’t want any reminders of Bianca.” 
Meanwhile, Bianca has admitted she didn't think Jamie's shocking eviction was genuine - and hoped he'd return to the house by now . Bianca got very close to Jamie in the house Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
